name: Petzl Irvis Flexlock Crampons
description: 10-point crampons built for easy to moderate mountain routes, glacier walking and ski touring. They have forged front rings for strength. The secondary points feature a 40° angle that offers good purchase on descents and predictability on steep snow. The intuitive Flexlock binding fits most boots and collapses for compact storage. A non-screw adjustment mechanism makes sizing easy and can be quickly changed to adapt them to ski boots or heavy hiking boots.Flex lock binding fits all boots.Lateral angle adjustment bar allows semi-rigid or articulated mode for stiff or flexible boot soles.Plastic polymer binding material stays flexible in extreme coldFits boot sizes 36–45.Antisnow plate included.CE / UIAA certified.
